abstract: JetBlue Airways, the U.S. discount carrier, agreed to buy Verizon Communications‘s Airfone business to offer e-mail and messaging services aboard planes.
lead_paragraph: JetBlue Airways, the U.S. discount carrier, agreed to buy Verizon Communications‘s Airfone business to offer e-mail and messaging services aboard planes.

headline.main: JetBlue Flies Off With Verizon Unit
